Note:
FLIP (8-bit)
X-axis
0x00 = looking for right
0x01 = looking for left

JUMP (8-bit)
0x01 = jump pressed
(spin dash doesn't change it)

MAIN SCREEN (8-bit)
0x00 = Start Game
0x01 = Sound Test

ACT RESULT (8-bit)
0xaa = Sonic text
0x96 = Blaze text

ACT RESULT (8-bit)
"Blaze has" or "Sonic has" text
0x01 = It's on the screen

ACT RESULT (8-bit)
"Blaze has" or "Sonic has" text
0x01 = It's on the screen

ACT RESULT (8-bit)
"passed" text
0x01 = It's on the screen

ACT RESULT (8-bit)
"passed" text
0x01 = It's on the screen

ACT RESULT (8-bit)
"act 1 2 or 3" text
0x01 = It's on the screen

ACT RESULT (8-bit)
"act 1 2 or 3" text
0x01 = It's on the screen

ACT RESULT (8-bit)
"Score" text
0x01 = It's on the screen

ACT RESULT (8-bit)
"Score" text
0x01 = It's on the screen

ACT RESULT (8-bit)
"Time Bonus" text
0x01 = It's on the screen

ACT RESULT (8-bit)
"Time Bonus" text
0x01 = It's on the screen

ACT RESULT (8-bit)
"Sprite background"
0x01 = It's on the screen

POST (8-bit)
0x00 = robotnik
0x01 = flipping robotnik
0x02 = flipping sonic
0x03 = sonic

D-PAD and BUTTONS (8-bit)
(basic)
0x01 = up
0x04 = left
0x08 = right
0x02 = down
0x10 = B
0x20 = C
0x40 = A
0x80 = start

(check other combinations, dual button pressed)

D-PAD and BUTTONS (8-bit)
(basic)
0x01 = up
0x04 = left
0x08 = right
0x02 = down
0x10 = B
0x20 = C
0x40 = A
0x80 = start

(check other combinations, dual button pressed)

INUNDATION / FLOOD (8-bit)
changing to 0xff is covering all the screen with water

LOCATION (8-bit)
0xd4 = Selecting Char
0x41 = Main Menu
0x47, ... , 0x4c = Playing
0x59 = Special Stage
0x5a = Special Stage Result
0x64 = Robotnik trying escape
0x65 = after sonic/blaze hit him
0x66 = Ending
0x6b = Credits
0x7d = End

ACTS (8-bit)
0x00 = act 1
0x01 = act 2
0x02 = act 3
0x03 = act 3 (Egg Hell)

[16-bit)
0x0000 = Golden Nature Act 1
0x0001 = Golden Nature Act 2
0x0002 = Golden Nature Act 3
0x0100 = Uncharted Tide Act 1
0x0101 = Uncharted Tide Act 2
0x0102 = Uncharted Tide Act 3
0x0200 = Creepy Crypt Act 1
0x0201 = Creepy Crypt Act 2
0x0202 = Creepy Crypt Act 3
0x0300 = Neon Star Act 1
0x0301 = Neon Star Act 2
0x0302 = Neon Star Act 3
0x0400 = Mad Parkland Act 1
0x0401 = Mad Parkland Act 2
0x0402 = Mad Parkland Act 3
0x0500 = Egg Hell Act 1
0x0501 = Egg Hell Act 2
0x0503 = Egg Hell Act 3 (don't have time)
0x0502 = Final Zone

ZONES (8-bit)
0x00 = Golden Nature
0x01 = Uncharted Tide
0x02 = Creepy Crypt
0x03 = Neon Star
0x04 = Mad Parkland
0x05 = Egg Hell
0x06 = Ending
0x07 = Sound Test

SCORE (32-bit)
The last zero on score screen is visual only
For example, a 58000 score will allocate a 5800 on the memory
5800 = 0x16a8

SOUND TEST (8-bit)
0x01 = minimum id
0x24 = maximum id

CHARACTER (8-bit)
0x00 = Sonic
0x01 = Blaze

(except Chaos Emeralds screen)
